name: TreeSelect
description: This is a form component to choose from hierarchical data.

properties.name: label
properties.label: Label
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine a label displayed in the selection box. When the handler returns a string, it is used as the label.

properties.name: options
properties.label: Options
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine a collection of options provided by the component.

properties.name: selectedOptionKey
properties.label: Selected Option Key(s)
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to make a programmatic selection of the option(s). The handler should return the key assigned to the option which the logic would like to select for single mode. In multiple mode it should return object with key-value pairs where key is the node key and value is a boolean to indicate selection. In checkbox mode, instead of a boolean, value should be an object that has "checked" and "partialChecked" properties to represent the checked state of a node.

properties.name: disabled
properties.label: Disabled
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if the component should be disabled. When the handler returns true, the component becomes disabled.

eventHandlers.name: onShow
eventHandlers.label: On Show Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the overlay is shown.

eventHandlers.name: onHide
eventHandlers.label: On Hide Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the overlay is hidden.

eventHandlers.name: onChange
eventHandlers.label: On Change Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the component's state (value) changes.

eventHandlers.name: onItemSelect
eventHandlers.label: On Item Select Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the item is selected.

eventHandlers.name: onItemUnselect
eventHandlers.label: On Item Unselect Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the item is unselected.

eventHandlers.name: onItemExpand
eventHandlers.label: On Item Expand Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the item is expanded.

eventHandlers.name: onItemCollapse
eventHandlers.label: On Item Collapse Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the item is collapsed.
